sentence.Network_en: A white - tailed sea eagle ( Haliaeetus albicilla ) catching a mackerel in Norway.
sentence.Network_cn: 图上是一只白尾海雕正在挪威捕食一条鲭鱼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 白头海雕_互动百科 ... 科： 鹰科 Accipitridae 属： 海雕属（haliaeetus） Haliaeetus 种： 白头海雕 H. leucocephalus.

list.abs: 白头海雕（haliaeetus leucocephalus）（学名：Haliaeetus leucocephalus）又名美洲雕。是美国的国鸟。
秃头雕（haliaeetus leucocephalus）(Haliaeetus leucocephalus)，又叫白头雕、美国雕、秃鹰，是海雕的一种。属鹰科，是唯一一种原产于北美的雕。

auth_sentence.content: Haliaeetus is possibly one of the oldest genera of living birds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Haliaeetus is possibly one of the oldest genera of living birds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Haliaeetus is possibly one of the oldest genera of living birds.

auth_sentence.content: Their closest relatives are the fishing eagles in the genus Ichthyophaga, very similar to the tropical Haliaeetus species.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their closest relatives are the fishing eagles in the genus Ichthyophaga, very similar to the tropical Haliaeetus species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their closest relatives are the fishing eagles in the genus Ichthyophaga, very similar to the tropical Haliaeetus species.
